comments.author: Thuron.5648
comments.body:
I’m looking to get a unique, new kind of application approved by ArenaNet.

This wvw application had it’s public release about 1,5 month ago. It makes use of the GW2 api in combination with the mumble link. The result is an application that shows objective information ‘hovering’ over the actual objectives in-game. Some of the users I have let me know they would like some kind of verification about the legality of the overlay, so hereby I would like to ask you, developers at ArenaNet, is it allowed to make this kind of use of the tools you give me? Here’s a link to the application’s website for details: http://www.gw2battlesupport.com
